short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that helps users gauge the toxicity of reddit comment threads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: reddit toxicity index is a Google Chrome extension that helps reddit users gauge the toxicity of comment threads.  The extension adds a color coded toxicity index (TI) to each post.  Toxic posts will have higher values, colored red.  Circle-jerky or otherwise benign posts will have lower values, colored green.
